products.name: Fairy Sparklers
products.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

products.name: Bottle Rockets
products.description: Will shoot out of a bottle.

products.name: Earth Shaker
products.description: Creates a large earth shattering boom.

products.name: Wake The Neighbors
products.description: Large, loud and bright. Will wake up entire neighborhood.

products.name: What Did You Say?
products.description: Our loudest commercially available product. Not responsible for loss of hearing.

products.name: Black Snake
products.description: Light on one end and watch snake expand.

products.name: Bottle Caps
products.description: Throw on ground and listen to the "pop".

products.name: Normal Lighter
products.description: This is just a lame, normal lighter.

products.name: Door Opener
products.description: Line the plastic explosive rope around the perimeter of locked door you are trying to unlock.

products.name: What Wall?
products.description: Place explosive in pentagram pattern to summon Satan and destroy wall.

products.name: Hows Your Hand?
products.description: Place on captives hand. He will not like how it feels on his hand.

products.name: Ouch
products.description: Will produce a loud and uncomfortable explosion that will hurt but not leave any visible marks.

products.name: Shit Your Pants
products.description: Explosion produces a specific sound wave that will make target shit their pants.

products.name: Big Ouch
products.description: Big Brother of Ouch. Same results with very visible marks. Also Death.

products.name: He Dead
products.description: Use this if you want to make dead.

products.name: What Earth?
products.description: Big Brother of What Wall?. Place on ground in pentagram pattern to summon Satan and destroy the entire planet.
